title: Chinese smartphone health code rules post-virus life
description: WUHAN, China (AP) — Since the coronavirus outbreak, life in China is ruled by a green symbol on a smartphone screen.
content:
WUHAN, China (AP) Since the coronavirus outbreak, life in China is ruled by a green symbol on a smartphone screen.
Green is the "health code" that says a user is symptom-free and its required to board a subway, check into a hotel or just enter Wuhan, the cen… [+4888 chars]
